positions.desc: Mark Green supports securing the US Southwest border and prioritizing border security, emphasizing that open-border policies put Americans at risk and claim lives. He criticizes President Biden's handling of the crisis, stating that the administration is more concerned with dismantling the wall than addressing the issue. Green also highlights the consequences of the border crisis on crime rates, national security, and K-12 schools.

positions.desc: Mark Green advocates for a strong U.S. response to the perceived threat of China, citing concerns over China's actions in the South China Sea, Belt and Road Initiative, and aggressive military posture towards allies, as well as its disregard for human rights and use of economic coercion. He emphasizes the need for America to lead the Free World in standing firm against China's aggression and protecting global democracy.

sources.tweet:
A truly “Bold Vision for America’s Future” would mean: 
➡️Standing up to China
➡️Standing up to Iran
➡️Standing with Israel.

America needs to prioritize energy independence NOW. We can't rely on foreign nations for our energy needs. 

Time to unleash American energy potential!

The CCP’s repeated disregard for human rights, use of economic coercion, and aggressive accumulation of power demand a strong U.S. response. We must take the China threat seriously and stand up for freedom. 

https://t.co/853r3zClzc

Communist China is a severe threat to global democracy. 

China's actions in the South China Sea, Belt and Road Initiative, and aggressive military posture towards our allies are concerning. 

America must lead the Free World in standing firm against China’s aggression.

This is no conspiracy theory. Our authoritarian adversaries—Communist China and Russia—are taking direct action and strengthening partnerships to undermine our nation’s economic interests and national security. 

https://t.co/EqVCalv2cR

Time and time again, Communist China has proven to be uncooperative in international efforts to promote peace and stability. 

https://t.co/KMO6zGZYUV
